text: -mEqva svEna# BAgaqdhEyEqnOpa# dhAvatiq sa EqvAsmai$ praqjAM praja#nayatipraqjApa#tiH paqSUna#sRujataq tE$&smAth sRuqShTAH parA$~jca Ayaqn tE yatrAva#saqn tatO# gaqrmududa#tiShThaqt tAn pUqShA cAqnvavai#tAq(gm)q sO$&bravIt pUqShA&nayA# mAq pratiqShThAtha# tvA paqSava# uqpAva#rthsyaqntItiq mAM pratiqShThEtiq sOmO$&bravIqn mamaq vA - [  ]  13
